prompt: Generate realistic text messages that represent non-spam (ham) content. These messages should reflect a broad spectrum of everyday communication, including personal conversations, legitimate business or service notifications, casual updates, and automated alerts. Vary the tone (friendly, professional, neutral, concerned), language style (informal chats, formal announcements, concise or detailed), and topics (meeting or appointment reminders, family or friend check-ins, order or delivery confirmations, bank transaction alerts, community or event updates). Include diverse formats like quick one-word replies, detailed explanations, friendly greetings, or automated system messages (e.g., OTP codes, subscription reminders). Ensure the content simulates authentic, non-malicious communication across different contexts, relationships, and platforms, avoiding any deceptive or promotional undertones.
response:
Hey! Just checking in, how’s everything going?  
Don’t forget about our meeting tomorrow at 2 PM. Looking forward to it!  
Your order has been shipped and will arrive by Thursday.  
Hi Mom, just wanted to let you know I made it home safely!  
Please confirm your appointment for next Thursday at 10 AM.  
I hope you’re feeling better today! Let me know if you need anything.  
Your subscription will renew on the 15th. Thanks for being with us!  
Just finished the project! Can’t wait to show you the results!  
Your bank alert: a withdrawal of $50 was made today.  
Let’s grab coffee this weekend; it’s been too long!  
Reminder: the community meeting is on Saturday at the library.  
Your verification code is 123456. Please enter it to proceed.  
Hey, I got your message! Let’s chat later.  
Thanks for your payment! Your receipt is attached.  
Can you pick up some groceries on your way home?  
Just a heads up, I’ll be out of town next week.  
The concert tickets are booked! Excited to go together!  
Your appointment has been rescheduled to Friday at 3 PM.  
I’m running late, but I’ll be there in about 15 minutes.  
Congratulations! You’ve been selected for the next round of interviews.  
Just wanted to remind you about the potluck this Friday.  
I’ll send you the documents by the end of the day.  
Please let me know if you can make it to the dinner on Sunday.  
Your feedback is valuable! Please take a moment to fill out our survey.  
I found your book! When should I drop it off?  
Thanks for your patience while we resolve this issue.  
Looking forward to our game night! What snacks should I bring?  
Your package is ready for pickup at the store.  
Just checking in to see how the project is going. Need any help?  
I’ll be at the gym around 5 if you want to join me.  
Your appointment is confirmed for the dentist on the 20th.  
Hey! I saw that movie you recommended; it was amazing!  
Just wanted to remind you about the deadline for submissions: next Friday.  
Your balance is low. Please add funds to avoid service interruption.  
I hope you enjoyed your vacation! Let’s catch up soon.  
Your delivery is scheduled for tomorrow between 1 PM and 3 PM.  
Thanks for your order! We appreciate your business.  
Can we reschedule our meeting to next week?  
I’m here if you need to talk.  
Your OTP for logging in is 654321.  
Looking forward to seeing you at the reunion next month!  
Just a quick reminder: bills are due this Friday.  
Thanks for the update! I’ll review it and get back to you.  
Your account has been successfully updated.  
Hope you’re having a great day! Let’s meet up soon.  
The workshop starts at 9 AM sharp. Don’t be late!  
I’ll be out of the office until Tuesday.  
Did you see the new restaurant that opened downtown?  
Your feedback is important to us; please let us know how we did!  
Let’s plan a family game night soon!  
Your refund has been processed and should appear in your account soon.
